answerText: V.[10] This title character of a Marcel Proust novel falls in love with Odette de Crecy because she resembles Zipporah in a Botticelli Sistine Chapel fresco. His friend Baron de Charlus tries to ensure that Odette does not cheat on this man.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Chicago Culture Heroes and Psychopomps | 5 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Answer the following about the works of Sandro Botticelli in literature, FTPE.   [10] Rafael Mantissa attempts to steal Botticelli's The Birth of Venus from the Uffizi in this novel about Herbert Stencil's search for the mysterious title character.
